title: Sunset Yoga by the Beach
shortDescription: Relax your mind and body during this peaceful sunset yoga session.
fullDescription: Experience a 90-minute rejuvenating yoga class with ocean views and calming music. Perfect for beginners and advanced practitioners alike.

title: Mountain Trail Hike
shortDescription: Guided 5-hour hike through scenic mountain paths.
fullDescription: Join our experienced guides on a breathtaking journey through lush trails and mountain peaks. Includes snacks, water, and first-aid support.

title: Cultural City Walking Tour
shortDescription: Discover local history and hidden gems with an expert guide.
fullDescription: Explore historical sites, local markets, and cultural landmarks in this 3-hour immersive walking tour. Great for newcomers and travelers!

title: Gourmet Cooking Workshop
shortDescription: Hands-on culinary class with a local chef.
fullDescription: Learn to cook authentic dishes using fresh local ingredients. Includes all materials and a full meal at the end.

title: Kayaking Through Mangroves
shortDescription: Paddle through scenic mangrove forests with a naturalist guide.
fullDescription: Enjoy this eco-friendly adventure exploring coastal mangroves, spotting exotic birds and marine life along the way.

title: Local Wine Tasting Evening
shortDescription: Taste the region’s best wines in a cozy vineyard setting.
fullDescription: Sample 6 wines paired with artisanal cheeses while learning about the winemaking process from local vintners.

title: Artisan Pottery Workshop
shortDescription: Create your own pottery with local artisans.
fullDescription: Get hands-on experience shaping and painting clay in this relaxing creative workshop. Includes materials and take-home piece.

title: Night Safari Adventure
shortDescription: Explore the wilderness under the stars with expert trackers.
fullDescription: An unforgettable wildlife experience featuring guided night treks, spotlighting nocturnal animals, and campfire refreshments.

title: Surfing for Beginners
shortDescription: Learn to surf with certified instructors.
fullDescription: Master the basics of surfing with a small group, including equipment, safety briefing, and beach training.

title: Photography Expedition
shortDescription: Capture the beauty of nature and architecture with a pro photographer.
fullDescription: Guided photography walk covering best local scenic spots. Ideal for all skill levels — bring your own camera!
